settings.label: Founder
settings.subheading: Ex. VP - Pernia's Popup Shop & Aditya Birla
settings.title: Trishanu Paul
settings.content: Welcome to Code to Couture, a hub where digital innovation converges with creative brilliance to elevate your online presence. In the ever-evolving digital realm of today, my journey as a digital marketer spans 7+ enriching years. My expertise lies in sculpting compelling narratives, crafting mesmerizing user experiences, and achieving remarkable outcomes. Our commitment extends beyond the ephemeral trends, as we place a premium on the timeless craft of storytelling and strategic execution. We understand that each pixel, every click, and every interaction holds significance in shaping the digital landscape.

settings.label: Creative Director
settings.title: Janvi Gandhi
settings.content:
Janvi Gandhi, a NIFT graduate with a Master’s in Luxury Brand Management from SP Jain School of Global Management and Milano Istituto Politechnico, boasts 6 years of experience as a branding and marketing professional.
Janvi has had the privilege of working with renowned brands such as SoulTree, Miraggio, Forli, Ritu Kumar, Varun Bahl, LuxuryAbode, BTFW, IAF, ReJoice Naturals, Vanilla Moon, and many more. Based in Gurugram, Janvi brings her wealth of expertise to the luxury branding and marketing industry.

settings.label: Performance Marketing
settings.title: Muskan Goyal
settings.content: I’m a dedicated professional passionate about optimising marketing campaigns on digital platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Google. My data analytics and trend-spotting expertise enable me to specialize in driving conversions and maximizing ROI in these digital spaces. My role goes beyond achieving results; it involves continuous monitoring and strategic adjustments. Whether it’s refining ad creatives, or adjusting targeting, I excel at expanding the online presence and delivering measurable success in the ever-evolving world of digital marketing.

settings.label: SEO
settings.title: Harsh Jha
settings.content:
I am an accomplished SEO Executive with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Application and a solid track record of two years in the field of Search Engine Optimization. Throughout my career, I have successfully managed numerous International and National SEO projects, demonstrating my ability to deliver tangible results and drive organic growth for diverse businesses.

With my blend of technical expertise, project management skills, and results-driven approach, I am poised to make a significant impact as an SEO Executive in any organization seeking to enhance its online presence and drive sustainable growth through search engine optimization.

settings.label: Website & UI/UX
settings.title: Aryan Sarang
settings.content: Dedicated Frontend Developer with a passion for crafting visually captivating and user-centric web experiences. Armed with a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React, I specialize in creating responsive, pixel-perfect websites that seamlessly adapt to diverse devices and browsers. With a keen eye for design principles, I collaborate effectively with designers to transform concepts into interactive realities, and I’m always eager to explore new technologies and frameworks to stay at the forefront of web development.

settings.label: Content
settings.title: MAhak Pawani
settings.content: As an SEO Copywriter, my role is to craft engaging content as I blend creativity with strategic optimization. Immersing myself in the intricacies of SEO, I relish the challenge of turning ideas into impactful, search-optimized narratives. It's a dance of creativity and analytics, where each word contributes to the rhythm of online visibility, and every sentence holds the key to unlocking digital success. Being a mass media student, my expertise involves crafting content that resonates with my audience, one keystroke at a time.

settings.label: Graphic Design
settings.title: Nishita Kamra
settings.content: I'm a versatile and passionate designer with a keen eye for detail and a knack for creative conceptualization. Graduated in B.Sc. fashion and lifestyle technology from Panjab University, Chandigarh, I’ve honed my skills through experience as a fashion designer for a luxury fusion and ethnic wear design label and have acquired expertise in computer graphics as a fashion illustrator. Specializing in research-driven commercial design, I'm always eager to explore new designs and collaborate seamlessly with creative teams to bring concepts to life.
